pd_1_com_0text: Could you remind me who’s my superior again?
pd_1_com_2text: There’s no other way to leave?
pd_2_com_0text: But why can't I just go see someone else?
pd_2_com_1text: There’s no other way to leave?
pd_3_com_0text: There's no other way to leave?
nd_text_0: Miss Johnson, I haven’t received authorization for your departure. Sorry.
nd_text_1: Trust me, I know when someone gets to leave this dump.
nd_text_2: Come on, Miss Johnson. You know you need your superior’s permission to leave the floor during work hours.
nd_text_3: That was uncalled for. Please leave now.
nd_text_4: That would be Dr. Schultz from Floor 7, but he’s away for today. Looks like you’re stuck.
nd_text_5: We don’t want everyone going up and down without any control now, do we? Risky business, even here.
nd_text_6:
Come on Miss Johnson, you’ve been here as long as I have.
You know the rules. Unless you’re going to be dissected upstairs, you need a permission.
Actually, you need a permission even for being dissected. Huh, imagine that.
